DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study evaluate effective nonsteroidal aromatase inhibitor ( NSAI ) plus abemaciclib postmenopausal woman breast cancer . Participants randomize abemaciclib placebo 2:1 ratio .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Nonsteroidal Aromatase Inhibitors Plus Abemaciclib ( LY2835219 ) Postmenopausal Women With Breast Cancer
